statements: UPDATE nft_metadata SET token_uri='updated_uri' WHERE nft_id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab';
UPDATE nft_metadata SET owner_address='new_owner' , token_uri='new_uri' , created_at='2022-05-01 10:00:00' WHERE nft_id='87654321-4321-4321-4321-0987654321ba';
UPDATE nft_metadata SET token_uri = 'new_token_uri_value', owner_address = 'new_owner_address_value' WHERE nft_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE nft_metadata SET owner_address = 'updated_owner_address_value', token_uri = 'updated_token_uri_value' WHERE token_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE metadata_table SET owner_address = '0x1234567890' WHERE token_id = 'token1';
UPDATE transaction_table SET timestamp = NOW(), transaction_type = 'TRANSFER' WHERE token_id = 'token2';
UPDATE metadata_table SET metadata_json = '{"name": "John Doe", "age": 30, "city": "New York"}' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE transaction_table SET timestamp = '2022-03-15 09:30:00' WHERE transaction_type = 'transfer'
UPDATE nft_metadata SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE nft_id = 1;
UPDATE nft_owners SET total_nfts_owned = 10, owner_address = '0x123456789' WHERE owner_id = 2;
UPDATE nft_metadata SET description = 'Updated description for nft_id=1' WHERE nft_id = 1;
UPDATE nft_transactions SET from_address = '0x123abc', to_address = '0x456def', amount = 100.50 WHERE tx_id = 5;
UPDATE nft_metadata SET token_description = 'Updated description' WHERE token_id = '12345';
UPDATE nft_ownership SET owner_address = 'new_owner_address' WHERE token_id = '54321';
UPDATE nft_metadata SET token_name = 'New Token Name', token_image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.png' WHERE token_id = '12345';
UPDATE nft_transactions SET to_address = '0x789DEF', from_address = '0xABC123', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '6789';
UPDATE NFT_Metadata SET token_description = 'Updated description' WHERE token_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE NFT_Transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.00, transaction_type = 'Buy' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE NFT_Metadata SET token_name = 'New Token Name', token_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE token_id = 'f7b8c64a-ddea-4b92-8050-5385c7471d0e';
UPDATE NFT_Transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_type = 'Sale' WHERE transaction_id = 'a8f5cd92-b9a0-4e28-b828-940ff5419b5e';
